title: Casablanca
description: Set during World War II, an American expatriate (Rick) must choose between his love for Ilsa and helping her husband escape to continue his fight against the Nazis.
summary: Classic 1942 romantic drama about love, sacrifice and duty in wartime Casablanca.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker (Neo) discovers the reality he knows is a simulation called the Matrix and joins rebels fighting its controllers.
summary: 1999 sci-fi/action landmark about reality, control and a rebellion against a simulated world.

title: Interstellar
description: As Earth becomes uninhabitable, a former pilot leads an expedition through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.
summary: Christopher Nolan's 2014 epic about family, time, gravity and humanity's survival.

title: Blade Runner
description: In a dystopian Los Angeles, a blade runner is tasked with hunting down rogue replicants—bioengineered humans.
summary: Ridley Scott's 1982 sci-fi noir exploring identity, memory and what it means to be human.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
summary: An epic tale of power, family, and betrayal — the Corleone crime family's legacy is passed on to Michael Corleone, who is torn between the life he wants and the destiny thrust upon him.
